The two subjects let us back into their very changed worlds and find that their surgeries, which had been lifelong goals, were far from the finish line of their journeys - in fact, they turned out to be only the beginning of more difficult, arduous and true lifelong experiences.(n)

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it.(n)

programme.title: You, Me and Him
programme.desc: Two female lovers, one a career driven lawyer (Lucy Punch), the other a fun-loving, pot-smoking layabout (Faye Marsay), have an annoying Casanova neighbor (David Tennant). While neither woman ever wanted children, both end up pregnant, creating conflicts that cause each to re-examine their outlook on life and their relationship.(n)

programme.title: Return To Me
programme.desc: After he suffers the devastating loss of his beloved wife Elizabeth, a Chicago building contractor (David Duchovny) unknowingly falls in love with the woman (Minnie Driver) who received Elizabeth's transplanted heart. Carroll O'Connor, James Belushi, Robert Loggia, Joely Richardson, David Alan Grier and Bonnie Hunt (who also wrote and directed) costar in this charming romantic comedy-drama.(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.(n)

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: Without adopting the romantic and moralistic cliches that have crippled many other films about addiction, Gus Van Sant directs Matt Dillon, Kelly Lynch, James Le Gros and Heather Graham in one of the most influential films of the late 1980s. Bob (Dillon) is the leader of a small gang of junkies that robs pharmacies and hospitals for prescription drugs. Alas, Bob is now starting to feel the burden of responsibility as he watches over his band of misfits. Van Sant's joyous and exhilarating second feature is notable for its humor and bravery.(n)

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated.(n)

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.(n)

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent.(n)

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.(n)

programme.title: A Foreign Affair
programme.desc: A reserved congresswoman investigating GI morals in post-World War II Berlin is wooed by a captain. (cc).

programme.title: The Spoilers
programme.desc: A prospector from Alaska fights for the love of a saloon singer. (cc).

programme.title: Kismet
programme.desc: The venerable fantasy about a wily beggar-magician masquerading as a prince in Baghdad, where he woos the favorite wife of the Grand Vizier and schemes to get his daughter matched up with a handsome caliph. Features a memorable Marlene Dietrich dance sequence in which she is painted gold from head to toe. (cc).

programme.title: Manpower
programme.desc: A pair of rough-and-tumble power-line workers vie for the affection of a Los Angeles nightclub hostess. (cc).

programme.title: Martin Roumagnac
programme.desc: A building contractor tries to win the affections of a shop owner. (cc).

programme.title: The Lady Is Willing
programme.desc: A stage star and a doctor enter a marriage of convenience so she can adopt a baby found abandoned.

programme.title: Mary Stevens, M.D.
programme.desc: Kay Francis as a dedicated doctor with romantic and maternal problems.

programme.title: Queen Christina
programme.desc: Mixture of history and fiction stars Greta Garbo as the 17th-century Swedish monarch who was raised as a boy to succeed to the throne, but finds love with a dashing Spanish emissary. (cc).

programme.title: Yes, My Darling Daughter
programme.desc: Cute adaptation of the Broadway play, questioning premarital sex. Priscilla Lane, Jeffrey Lynn. Jaywood: Roland Young. Mrs. Murray: Fay Bainter. Granny: May Robson. Connie: Genevieve Tobin. Dibble: Spencer Charters. Lewis: Ian Hunter. Officer: Edward Gargan. William Keighley directed. (cc).

programme.title: Baby Face
programme.desc: Restored version of the provocative (in its day) melodrama starring Barbara Stanwyck as a strumpet who uses men as steppingstones to success in this variation of the rags-to-riches formula. George Brent, Donald Cook, John Wayne. Directed by Alfred E. Green. (cc).

programme.title: Jezebel
programme.desc: A haughty antebellum Southern Belle loses her sweetheart when she wears a scandalous dress to a ball where all young ladies wear white. (cc).

programme.title: The Unsinkable Molly Brown
programme.desc: Musical biography of the backwoods girl who struck it rich in Colorado and survived the Titanic. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Women
programme.desc: An all-star, all-female cast is featured in an adaptation of the Clare Boothe Luce Broadway hit about a cabal of catty and chatty high-society women who chime in on the affairs of a loving wife and mother who's dealing with an adulterous husband. (cc).

programme.title: The Guns of Navarone
programme.desc: During World War II, a crack team of six commandos undertakes a suicide mission to destroy two massive German guns that guard a strategic channel in the Aegean Sea and block Allied passage. (cc).

programme.title: The Dirty Dozen
programme.desc: World War II thriller about an American major who recruits a group of military prisoners for a suicide mission on a French chateau held by top Nazi officers. Since no "normal" GI can be expected to volunteer for this assignment, the "volunteers," serving life sentences, receive the dim promise of getting pardons if they survive. (cc).

programme.title: Operation Crossbow
programme.desc: Secret agents of the Allied forces take on a mission to go behind enemy lines and covertly destroy a German missile base. (cc).

programme.title: The Memphis Belle A Story of a Flying Fortress
programme.desc: The 25th World War II mission of a B-17F Flying Fortress. A war report produced by the Government and directed by then-Lt. Col. William Wyler.

programme.title: Wings for the Eagle
programme.desc: At a factory making aircrafts during WWII, Brad and Roma experience dissonance in their marriage. This is exacerbated when Brad's friend moves in with them to avoid being drafted and becomes enamored with Roma. (cc).

programme.title: Twelve O'Clock High
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee about an embattled Army Air Corps general who takes over the 918th Bomber Group for raids over World War II Germany when he deems their previous commander has gotten too close with his men. (cc).

programme.title: Flying Leathernecks
programme.desc: In World War II, a tough officer leads Marine pilots in the South Pacific, where his no-nonsense way of commanding is at odds with the easygoing approach of the executive officer. (cc).

programme.title: Back to Bataan
programme.desc: During WWII, Colonel Joe Madden agrees to stay behind after the Army is ordered to leave the Philippines and organize an underground resistance movement. (cc).

programme.title: The Wings of Eagles
programme.desc: A reckless World War I Naval aviator with a drinking problem becomes paralyzed after a fall, ending his military career. However, he becomes a respected screenwriter, and when World War II breaks out he finds a way to fight for his country again. (cc).

programme.title: Operation Pacific
programme.desc: A World War II submarine commander's attempts to reconcile with his ex-wife are hampered by important missions, including rescuing orphans from a Japanese-controlled island. (cc).

programme.title: They Were Expendable
programme.desc: A saga of the PT boats and the sailors who manned them in the Philippines during WWII. Inspired by actual events. (cc).

programme.title: December 7th
programme.desc: Recounting the attack on Pearl Harbor and American's subsequent entry into WWII. Directed by Gregg Toland and John Ford.

programme.title: From Here to Eternity
programme.desc: Best Picture winner is a portrait of life on a Honolulu Army post just before the attack on Pearl Harbor, and focuses on two rebellious privates and a tough but fair-minded sergeant who's swept into a torrid affair with his CO's wife. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Across the Pacific
programme.desc: A disgraced ex-Army officer jumps a Japanese steamer bound for the Panama Canal Zone in 1941, and along the way he uncovers intrigue about the Japanese and their plans for the Canal Zone. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Clay Pigeon
programme.desc: A sailor (Bill Williams) sets out to prove he was not guilty of treason in World War II. Barbara Hale. Directed by Richard Fleischer. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Cornered
programme.desc: Film-noir thriller about a Canadian WWII pilot who tries to track down the Nazi collaborators responsible for his French wife's death. His search takes him to Buenos Aires, where his strong-arm tactics run afoul of Argentine authorities and a pro-French underground group that also wants to bring the killer to justice. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Thousands Cheer
programme.desc: An acrobat enlists in the Army and wants to put on a Big Show for his fellow servicemen. Along the way, he falls in love with the daughter of his colonel. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Stage Door Canteen
programme.desc: During World War II, theater and film stars fete marines, sailors and soldiers on leave in New York City, where one USO worker ignores the rules and falls for a soldier. Nominated for Best Score Oscar and Best Song ("We Mustn't Say Goodbye"). (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hollywood Canteen
programme.desc: The millionth soldier to enter the serviceman's center wins a date with the woman of his dreams. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Clay Pigeon
programme.desc: A sailor (Bill Williams) sets out to prove he was not guilty of treason in World War II. Barbara Hale. Directed by Richard Fleischer.(n)

programme.title: The Password Is Courage
programme.desc: Fact-based account of a World War II hero named Coward, a British POW who does everything he can to humiliate his Nazi captors as he seeks to engineer an escape from the prison camp. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Onionhead
programme.desc: A lazy college student joins the Coast Guard as a cook when his grades drop and his relationship with a girlfriend sours. Fully expecting to sit out WWII in peace and quiet, instead, he runs afoul of navy protocol in general and an officer in particular. (cc).(n)

programme.title: No Time for Sergeants
programme.desc: A good-natured, bumptious farm boy, whose father has been hiding his draft notices, is inducted into the Air Force, where his trust and naiveté don't sit well with a nasty private and a harried noncom. The novel on which the film is based was adapted for TV in 1955, then became a Broadway play, a movie and finally a TV sitcom. Andy Griffith starred in the teleplay, the theater version and the big-screen production. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Ripley awakens 57 years later in this sequel to 1979's "Alien," returning to the space colony where she first encountered a hideous, reptilian creature. The film won Oscars for Sound and Visual Effects. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Stick It
programme.desc: A brush with the law sends a troublesome teen back into the world of competitive gymnastics and a tough coach. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Dragonfly

programme.title: Crazy Heart
programme.desc: Jeff Bridges won the Best Actor Oscar as an alcoholic country star who's fallen on hard times. His tour now stops at bowling alleys and bars, and the booze is starting to compromise his health. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Kong Skull Island
programme.desc: A disillusioned soldier and a photojournalist join an expedition to Skull Island, an uncharted territory in the Pacific. There, the group get caught up in an ongoing war between a gigantic ape called King Kong and the area's indigenous predators. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: 500 Days of Summer
programme.desc: Greeting-card copywriter Tom falls head over heels for his coworker Summer in this romantic comedy. Tom thinks that he's finally found his soul mate, but Summer claims not to believe in true love and is only interested in having some fun with Tom. The film moves forward and backward through various incidents in Tom and Summer's 500-day love affair. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: Arthur and Norma Lewis (James Marsden and Cameron Diaz) receive a mysterious box that will grant them $1 million if they push the button inside, but they must debate if that's worth the consequence of killing a random person. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Shopgirl
programme.desc: Steve Martin adapted his novella and stars in this perceptive and bittersweet triangle tale involving a millionaire, an aspiring artist (Claire Danes) and a slacker (Jason Schwartzman). Bridgette Wilson-Sampras, Sam Bottoms. Directed by Anand Tucker. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A brilliant quadriplegic detective forensics expert tracks a serial killer using computer technology, enlisting help from a gifted, but inexperienced rookie. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: Serena plays in her first tournaments since giving birth to her daughter, continuing to adjust to life as a mother and tennis superstar. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: All the Real Girls

programme.title: In the Cut

programme.title: Garden State
programme.desc: A twentysomething slacker (writer-director Zach Braff) faces his estranged family when he returns to New Jersey for his mother's funeral. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Seabiscuit

programme.title: Cooties

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A math genius works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations. programme.title: Orange County

programme.title: Sister Act

programme.title: Neighbors 2 Sorority Rising
programme.desc: Young parents Mac and Kelly find that their neighbor troubles are far from over when a hedonistic sorority moves in next door just as they're about to sell their house. programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore makes her directorial debut with this quirky sports drama about an ex-beauty queen (Ellen Page) who gives up her tiara for roller derby, to the dismay of her mother (Marcia Gay Harden). Kristen Wiig, Juliette Lewis. (cc).(c)

programme.title: La La Land
programme.desc: Struggling actress Mia and aspiring jazz pianist Sebastian begin a whirlwind romance as they both pursue their dreams in Los Angeles. However, their blossoming relationship is challenged when their careers pull them in different directions. (cc).(c)

programme.title: Why Him?
programme.desc: An adoring dad is horrified to discover that his daughter's tech-billionaire boyfriend is a tattooed, party-hearty lout. Despite the latter's heart of gold, the father refuses to warm to him—especially when he learns about his engagement plans. (cc).(c)

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Playboy man-child Arthur learns that his wealthy mother will only give him his inheritance if he agrees to marry the daughter of a millionaire. However, Arthur hates his intended bride and instead falls for an unlicensed tour guide. (cc).(c)

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: Three female African-American mathematicians provide crucial calculations for NASA's space race against the Soviets, all while dealing with the racist and sexist assumptions of their white co-workers. (cc).

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Set in the year 2018, John Connor leads the human resistance against the computer network Skynet as the machines grow more aggressive than ever before. John was raised to believe in a specific version of the future, but that future begins to shift with the appearance of mysterious former death-row inmate Marcus Wright. As John and Marcus venture into the mechanical heart of Skynet's operations, they make a terrifying discovery about the potential fate of the human race. (cc).

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A team of mercenaries led by a former CIA operative is hired by the IRA to recover a mysterious briefcase before it's sold to Russian agents. Before long, the assignment turns into a deadly game of cat and mouse. (cc).

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Julian is a stylish and successful male prostitute whose life goes downhill when he's framed for murder after doing a pimp a favor. The only person he can trust is a politician's wife who is frustrated with her husband, and is the only woman he sleeps with who doesn't pay for his services. (cc).

programme.title: The Truth About Charlie
programme.desc: A loose remake of the 1963 film "Charade," this romantic thriller focuses on a mysterious American who aids a Parisian who is menaced by crooks after her husband is killed. (cc).

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: The Coen brothers' sly drama about a policewoman (Frances McDormand) who's trying to determine how several murders and a kidnapping are linked to an unassuming car salesman (William H. Macy). Showalter: Steve Buscemi. Grimsrud: Peter Stormare. (cc).

programme.title: Dolores Claiborne
programme.desc: A big-city journalist discovers a terrible secret about her family's past after her estranged mother becomes the prime suspect in the death of the elderly woman for whom she had been caring. Soon the daughter learns the details of her father's mysterious death years before, and eventually she realizes how profoundly she misunderstood her mother. (cc).

programme.title: State of Play
programme.desc: Adaptation of the British miniseries concerning suspicious events that set a rising congressman and a dogged reporter on a dangerous collision course. A U.S. congressman Stephen Collins is ascending the ladder of power, but his bid for the presidency hits the skids after his research assistant/mistress is viciously murdered. Now top reporter Cal McAffrey is eager to get the truth. But McAffrey has just walked into a major cover-up. (cc).

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes puts his strength and intellect to the test as he teams with Watson to battle Lord Blackwood, a formidable new adversary who is determined to destroy England. (cc).

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Boston cop Thomas Craven discovers his grown daughter Emma led a double life after she is shot to death on his doorstep. Craven investigates her murder and soon uncovers evidence of corporate cover-ups and a government conspiracy. Meanwhile, mysterious government agent Darius Jedburgh sets out to erase all evidence of the crime. (cc).

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Forensics expert Alex Cross investigates the disappearance of a senator's daughter, a student at a prestigious private academy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Invictus
programme.desc: President Nelson Mandela inspires the South African rugby team to strive for the World Cup in hopes of soothing the country's racial tensions. programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Miejska lista
programme.desc: Prowadząca program, Ola, odwiedza polskie miasta i zachęca ludzi, by wybierali klipy, które chcieliby usłyszeć.

programme.title: Przesłuchanie
programme.desc: W każdym odcinku przesłuchiwana jest jedna z gwiazd show-biznesu. Twórcy programu zadają jej niewygodne pytania.

programme.title: 10 hitów 1 po 2
programme.desc: Twórcy programu w każdym wydaniu prezentują 10 wybranych hitów. Utwory, będące największymi przebojami najsłynniejszych wykonawców, grane są jeden po drugim.

programme.title: Ranking Jankesa
programme.desc: Krzysztof "Jankes" Jankowski przedstawia subiektywny ranking tego, co najlepsze w sieci, muzyce, świecie show-biznesu i wszystkich innych interesujących rzeczy, którymi dzieli się z widzami.

programme.title: Weekend z Eską TV
programme.desc: Autorzy programu zabierają widzów do najciekawszych miejsc w Polsce. Przeprowadzają wywiady, pokazują kulisy swojej pracy, relacjonują wydarzenia, którym towarzyszyły kamery Eski TV.

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV.(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV.(n)

Mildred receives a singing teddy from home and it makes her feel homesick. When Mildred looks to Maud for help in Miss Gullet's transformations class, Maud doesn't bail her out and Mildred turns Ethel into a pig instead of a mouse into frog. She doesn't even manage to turn Ethel back successfully - she still has a pig's snout! Mildred receives a harsh warning from Miss Hardbroom who threatens expulsion if she can't perform the spell correctly. Mildred feels fed up with all the rules of school and always being the worst witch. It's the final straw, she wants to go home. Drusilla intercepts her leaving, telling her that Maud and Enid are fighting. But it's a trick, and Mildred finds herself facing Ethel.
